title: Really fixed the speed issue now, though using a compromise.
message: Really fixed the speed issue now, though using a compromise.

title: Commit 245471, which attempted to improve speed by first showing the toast, then…
message: Commit 245471, which attempted to improve speed by first showing the toast, then switching the boot receiver off, didn't have the desired effect, since the toast will only begin to show once control flow is back at Android's message processing, presumably. This is a crazy alternative attempt to fix the issue, but one that improved things only minimally at best (we want to keep it anyway though, so we'll check it in, then revert it). It turns out that calling PackageManager.setComponentEnabledSetting() will somehow globally lock/slow down the system (Android 1.1, G1) to the extend that our toast will show delayed, no matter what.
